.. :changelog:

History
=======

0.2.0 (03-Dec-2015)
-------------------

* Rewritten from scratch.
* Implements almost complete set of TSIP commands supported by
  Trimble Copernicus II and Thunderbolt/Thunderbolt-E GPS
  receivers.

0.1.0 (20-Jun-2015)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.
